      Returns:

    • getDirection

      public int getDirection​(int column, int row, int columns, int rows)
      Returns the direction the laser exits depending on where it enters
      Parameters:
      column - The column where it enters
      row - The row where it enters
      columns - The columns
      rows - The rows
      Returns:
      The direction the lasers exits. 1 if the laser goes up. 2 if the laser goes down. 3 if the laser goes to the left. 4 if the laser goes to the right

    • getDirection

      public int getDirection​(int column, int row, int columns, int rows, char direction1)
      Returns the direction the laser exits depending on what corner it enters.
      Parameters:
      column - The column where it enters
      row - The row where it enters
      columns - The columns
      rows - The rows
      direction1 - V if the laser goes vertically. H if the laser goes horizontally
      Returns:
      The direction the lasers exits. 1 if the laser goes up. 2 if the laser goes down. 3 if the laser goes to the left. 4 if the laser goes to the right

    • shootLaser

      public void shootLaser​(Game game, java.lang.String name)
      Shoots a laser in the game
      Parameters:
      game - The game
      name - The name of the player

      length - The length of the coordinate
